qa_pair.question: Find the torrent that was added on January 15, 2024 and has the highest upload ratio among all torrents added that day. What is the torrent's name?

Among all torrents that completed downloading (100% done) between March 1 and March 31, 2024, which one took the longest time from when it was added until it finished? How many days did it take to complete? Provide only the number of days.
Find all torrents labeled "linux-distros" that were added in Q1 2024. Which torrent among these has uploaded the most data (in total bytes uploaded)? Provide the torrent's hash string.
Look for torrents that are currently seeding (status = "Seeding") and have been seeding for more than 90 days. Among these torrents, which one has the lowest upload ratio? Provide the torrent ID.
Find the torrent with the most peers connected that was added in December 2023. The torrent should have at least 5 GB in size. What is this torrent's name?

Among all torrents that have an error status (error code not equal to 0), which torrent has been in error state the longest? Calculate this based on the time since it was added. Provide the torrent's name.

Find the torrent that contributed the most to your total upload statistics. This torrent should have been added before January 1, 2024 and have an upload ratio greater than 5.0. What is the total amount of data (in GB) that this torrent has uploaded? Provide the answer rounded to 2 decimal places.

Look for torrents with the label "movies" that were completed in Q4 2023. Among these torrents, which one has the highest download speed average? To find this, look for the torrent that completed fastest relative to its size (shortest time from add to completion per GB). Provide the torrent ID.

Find all torrents that are currently stopped (status = "Stopped") and were added more than 6 months ago. What is the total disk space (in GB) being used by these stopped torrents? Provide the answer rounded to 2 decimal places.

Among torrents added in February 2024 that are now 100% complete, which torrent had the most consistent download speed (least variance between periods of activity)? To determine this, find the torrent that completed closest to its ETA prediction. Provide the torrent's name.
